name: Fixes modpack
description: This modpack includes a number of fixes for Cosmic Reach
base_url: https://example.com, prefix to url tags without https://
game_version: Put the CR version here, e.g. 'Pre-alpha-0.3.1'

mods.name: NAME (optional maybe)
mods.sha512_hash: hash of the file, (Required if download_url is present.)
mods.mod_type: Put mod loader, eg quilt, data, puzzle
